name: Escape Room: Christmas Quest
summary:
Addictive Escape room - Christmas Quest!, find the clues and collect objects to solve puzzles!
This Christmas party room escape story is full of secrets and riddles. A new free game, Find keys to unlock all doors. You will be pleasantly surprised by the variety of levels with brainstorming puzzles.So now she needs to make a real detective investigation, solve puzzles, seek and find solutions to the difficult situations so that you can be in time for escape from Christmas party house.
